data.text:
@sistercitamr Hola de nuevo Yasmina, por favor contacta con nosotros por mensaje privado con el número de serie de la máquina para que podamos ayudarte.
Un saludo.

@sistercitamr Hola Yasmina, buenos días. Dejaste la máquina en Mediamarkt, ¿ellos se encuentran tramitando la reparación?
¡Un saludo!
@sue_ecampbell If you'd like some help with your Dyson, send us a private message with the serial number & your contact details. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@HeyGunR Les stocks sont vides, nous n'avons aucun moyen de'en remettre en vente. N'hésitez pas à vous inscrire sur notre newsletter afin de ne plus manquer aucune de nos promos !

@palms126 Hi there, great question! We would recommend checking with your local municipality to see what their recommendations for recycling are. When it comes to the battery or motorized parts, they may have rules specific to where you reside.

Best wishes.

With cutting-edge facilities, world-leading engineers and real projects that bring theory to life, our Undergraduates are equipped to develop transformational future technologies. #dyson #dysoninstitute #engineersofthefuture #engineeringdegree https://t.co/r2cq9V5zHB

@alkampo Kusura bakmayın Alkım Bey, cihazınızın arıza tespit işlemlerinden geçmesi için öncelikle destek hattımız ile irtibata geçmenizi öneriyoruz. Cihazınızın garantisini ve kaydınızı kontrol edebilmemiz için cihaz bilgilerinizi bizimle DM üzerinden paylaşabilirsiniz. Teşekkürler.
@vivabishvegas What a sad day! We'd be happy to look into getting this repaired, Michael. Feel free to send us a DM and we can go from there. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@alkampo Merhaba Alkım Hanım, Dyson Türkiye ile iletişime geçtiğiniz için teşekkür ederiz. Size nasıl yardımcı olabiliriz?
@HeyGunR Bonjour, malheureusement nous n'avons pas d'information sur une éventuelle remise en stock de l'appareil 😕

@Nomad_Trader Hi, we are extremely sorry to hear that and we will surely arrange a callback from our expert to address your concern. May we please request you to share your registered details for better assistance?
Regards,
Ashutosh, Dyson India
Toll free: 1800-258-6688

Engineered for versatility and inspired by natural light, the Dyson Lightcycle Morph™ has unique local daylight tracking and delivers light throughout a room in four different formats – as an indirect, task, feature or ambient light.  #dyson #dysonhome

Today, the RCPCH and RCP have published a highly-anticipated report, supported by Dyson, about the growing evidence on indoor air pollution. The report sets out recommendations aimed at preventing the impact of indoor air quality on the well-being of children. https://t.co/25tX9IjIAI
@mirsatkurtoglu2 Merhaba Mirsat Bey, gösterdiğiniz ilgiden ötürü teşekkür ederiz. Buharlı ütü ürünümüz bulunmamaktadır. Teşekkürler.

@l_inadapte D'accord alors en résumé c'est un nom que nous donnons au moteur intelligent Dyson d'une part pour le différencier des moteurs classiques et d'autre part parce qu'il vérifie sans cesse tout ce qu'il se passe dans l'appareil.
@plegoux Bonjour Patrice, ok parfait ! Tenez nous au courant dès que vous recevrez votre nouveau Dyson 👍
@TamaraNickolson Vervelend dat je dit zo ervaren hebt Tamara. Mag ik vragen wat het probleem is wellicht dat ik je hierbij kan helpen.
@sjimenezmateo Gracias a ti por contactarnos!

@sjimenezmateo Buenos días Sergio, en el caso que tengas suelos de parquet recomendamos el modelo Absolute. Si no tienes parquet, el modelo Animal es el indicado. Ambas traen accesorios para muebles.
¡Un saludo!
@woodoow That does sound rather unusual. Feel free to DM us with come pictures & the serial number of the machine. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@floweringsword Hi Miriam, we're sorry to hear this. We would love to receive your feedback and pass it along to the team. Would you be happy to confirm your country of residence?

Best wishes.

@andreaapril1388 Hi Andrea, thanks for reaching out. In this instance, we would suggest emailing our HR team directly, at americas.highvolumerecruiting@dyson.com.

Best wishes.
@notmlo Congratulations on your new Dyson! 😊

@LACraftyMama Hi there, it looks like you were able to speak to a Helpline agent, and get the order resolved. Your machine and tools are processing. Tracking will be emailed as soon as its available.

Best wishes.
As the year of the rat unfolds, give the gift of powerful home cleaning with Dyson. #dyson #lunarnewyear #新年快樂 #恭喜發財 https://t.co/HQUj1OvbYf
@OzOntweeter We'd be happy to look into this for you, Oz. Please send us a private message with some more information. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@Autol50Dani Eso es genial Dani, nos alegra que se haya solucionado.
Cualquier cosa nos dices. 😉

@Autol50Dani En los tubos también se puede quedar suciedad acumulada que puede bloquear el pasao del aire. Además, si el filtro está sucio como el aire tiene que recoger un recorrido más largo se le dificulta. 
Ya nos dirás si se soluciona Dani. 😀

@Autol50Dani Hola Dani, cuando una máquina funciona intermitente es debido a un bloqueo o a que el filtro está sucio. Te dejamos estos vídeos para ayudarte.
https://t.co/qM5ZMxBVD4
https://t.co/KF3BUsNMJK
Esperamos que se solucione. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

Dyson Village is an innovative new typology for high quality student accommodation and provides a place of education, sport and a home for our Undergraduate Engineers. #dyson #insidedyson #dysoninstitute https://t.co/Z8zRUHMZYI

@Dane0r Hi Dane, We're happy to hear that we provided you with such fantastic support at our Dyson Service Center. We always enjoy hearing great feedback and have passed along your message to the team. We appreciate your support for Dyson technology and hope you have a great day!

@plegoux Bonjour Patrice, navrés de cet incident nous espérons que vous n'avez pas été blessé ! Pourriez vous svp nous transmettre ces photos via help@dyson.fr en précisant vos coordonnées personnelles (mail/tél) ? Nous allons faire remonter cela au plus vite.

@l_inadapte Nous avons choisi le terme "numérique" car le microprocesseur intégré contrôle et réajuste constamment l'alimentation, rotation et puissance du moteur grâce à des impulsions numériques. Plus d’info ici : https://t.co/8vrU4GtHGu

@Comtesse_Leia Bonjour, il est possible de nous en faire part en nous écrivant sur ce mail : external.ideas@dyson.com
Belle journée 🙂
@DavidMcComb18 We've replied to your Direct Message.

@GregorKaplan We can definitely provide some cleaning steps, Gregor. We just need a bit more information. Please feel free to send us a DM with your serial number and email, and we can see which machine you have and provide some help.

Our Undergraduate Engineers are engineers from day one. Tough projects, with real responsibilities and a job waiting for them at the end.  #dyson #dysoninstitute #engineering #engineeringdegree #degreeapprenticeships

@aperezmir Buenos días Anna, gracias por contactar con Dyson. Escríbenos a través de un mensaje privado con tus datos para verificar tu caso por favor.
Un saludo.
@elifthesweetie Bize ve ürünlerimize gösterdiğiniz ilgiden ötürü biz teşekkür ederiz. 😊

@elifthesweetie Amerika ve Türkiye elektrik sistemlerinin farklı olduğunu hatırlatmak isteriz. Bu nedenden ötürü farklı elektrik sistemine sahip ülkelerden alınan cihazların lisanslı bir voltaj çevirici(adaptör değil) ile kullanılmasını tavsiye ediyoruz.
@elifthesweetie Merhaba Elif Hanım, Airwrap ürünümüz peşin fiyatına 12 taksit fırsatı ile satışta bulunmaktadır. Bu ürünümüzü https://t.co/hT4UwoftYJ adresinden görebilirsiniz. Teşekkürler.
@FNardogan Merhaba Fatma Hanım, Dyson ürünlerine olan ilginizden ötürü teşekkürler. Fırsatlarımızı https://t.co/Fkk3VHjZEr adresinden takip edebilirsiniz.
Curl. Wave. Smooth. Dry. We’ve engineered four new attachments for the The Dyson Airwrap™ styler to make it easier to style longer and shorter hair. #dyson #dysonhair https://t.co/hOHw8B3ZW2
@muellerfreizeit If this is your product then feel free to get in contact with us, and we can pass you through to the relevant team to get any issues resolved! https://t.co/RHgPAH4vzm

“My attitude has always been to take on high-potential young people, give them immediate responsibility, and mentor them through. It’s not an easy option to choose, but that’s why we are developing some truly exceptional engineers.”- Sir James Dyson. #dyson #engineeringdegree
@suddenlysmile お問い合わせありがとうございます。この度は弊社製品の異音でご不便をおかけし、誠に申し訳ございません。これからダイレクトメッセージをお送りしますので、よろしければご返信ください。
@DianaDJ7 Congratulations on your new Dyson! 😊❤ https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@rekmira That's great feedback! Thanks for sharing. ❤ https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@stephbradley1 That's not what we'd expect to hear. Feel free to DM us with your contact details & serial number so we can look into this for you. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@KevinOakes14 So that we can refer this to the correct team, please DM us with your address, email address & contact phone number. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
Make it yours with foil colour embossing, available exclusively at Dyson Demo stores when you buy the Dyson Airwrap™ styler or Dyson Supersonic™ hair dryer. #dyson https://t.co/eF5Eqpb72o
@steffilynn28 Thank you for your continued support, Stephanie-Lynn! We're happy to hear you're enjoying your Dyson technology!

@flaviagrilli Hello Flavia, that definitely sounds frustrating. We're happy to help. Please feel free to send us a private message with your email and address, and we can take a look into this for you.

@RomainDelfosse Hello, every country has his own offers, we cannot unlock anything. 

The only way for you to get a machine from another country is to give a delivery address from that country during the purchase.

@superhyphysimon Bonjour, nous ne prenons pas les candidatures de via les réseaux sociaux en revanche nous proposons parfois des postes via les réseaux traditionnels tels que Indeed, Fashion Job ou LinkedIn 🙂

@jinsightr Hi there, thank you for your feedback.Dyson takes feedback from our owners seriously as we understand that the comments we receive from our customers help us continue to move forward and create technology that makes sense. We will pass this along to our engineering team.
@MeowMag 😍

@SheeMeHer_Ana Hi there, thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the Dyson Airwrap™ styler. Our engineers are always finding ways to make our products more useful. As more attachments are added, they'll become available on the Dyson website. 

Best wishes.

@globalglitter Hi there, thank you for sharing your feedback. I'm happy to share that this is the kind of experience that we expect if support is ever needed. We appreciate your support for Dyson technology and hope you have a great day!

Best wishes.

@kelso0ooo We definitely understand! At this time, we do not have an estimated date of arrival for the Professional Supersonic stock, but you can sign up to be notified via email using the link below: 
https://t.co/WTLlqQaQju
@Brkgcrdm Merhaba Burak Bey,  Dyson Türkiye ile iletişime geçtiğiniz için teşekkür ederiz. WhatsApp destek hattımız üzerinden iletişime geçtiniz mi? Nasıl yardımcı  olabilriz?

@Breakmork69 Gracias por tu respuesta, puedes contactar con nosotros a través de facebook por mensaje privado para que podamos ver a qué se debe la demora en la entrega del nuevo producto y la recogida.
Un saludo.

@edfwalker Pulsing is an inbuilt feature of the machine. It'll pulsate when there isn't enough air flowing over the motor. Remove the filter and run the machine. It'll run smoothly.  DM us for further advise. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
Our Undergraduate Engineers are engineers from day one. Tough projects, with real responsibilities and a job waiting for them at the end. #dyson #dysoninstitute
@notpaulmsmit Fijn om te horen dat u uiteindelijk toch voor Dyson heeft gekozen en tevreden bent😄

@JoseFernando157 Buenos días, desde Dyson España no podemos organizar recogidas que se encuentran fuera de la Península, te vamos a facilitar el enlace de Dyson México para que puedan ayudarte con tu incidencia https://t.co/jSIybJLsrw
Un saludo.
@matt_ochocinco Oh no. Please send us a DM with your detials, and we can certainly help you with this.
@getoffthefence We do apologise if you been unable to contact us. Our call queue is higher than normal at the moment. Please send us a DM on here with your query, and we would be happy to help.

@biglondon12 The machines are delivered on MAX mode and this reduces the run time to 5 minutes. Please check this function on your machine. If you require further assistance, please send us a DM with your details.

@Lessons4aLover You can plug the charger directly into the power point without mounting the machine. If you'd like more information DM us with the serial number of your machine. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@Whodakat Hello, Dyson takes feedback from our owners seriously as we understand that the comments we receive from our customers help us continue to move forward and create technology that makes sense. We've passed your feedback along to the engineering team.

Best wishes.

@TeslaMOD3L Hi there, thank you for letting us know. We're happy to hear this was resolved. Let us know if we can assist you with anything else.

Best wishes.

@TeslaMOD3L Hello there, thanks for reaching out. I can confirm that it is normal to see this in the bin, as its used in production for the fitting of seals. Sealed products are brand new and have not been resold as conditioned machines.

Best wishes.

@andyphllps We're sorry to hear you have experienced an issue with your machine. We always aim to get back to customers within 24 hours, so it may be that we did not receive your original message; I do apologise. However, we're pleased to hear you managed to get your issue resolved.

@popsicl41141742 In order to DM us you need to be following Dyson on Twitter. It will then give you this option to message us. Unfortunately we are unable to send you a DM because you are not currently following our page, so our system won't let us message.

@ButlerGK Apologies for any disappointment. Unfortunately Lithium batteries are subject to degradation and this is the same with any product that uses this type of battery. There are many factors that affect the lifetime of the battery, so it is difficult to put an exact lifetime on it.
@Missjd19 So all of our upright and cylinder machines come with a 5-year guarantee and our cordless, handhelds robot, hair care and air care products come with a 2 year guarantee.

@popsicl41141742 We're sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM with your full name and address including postcode, plus your registered email address. We can then access your account and help you with this.

@LindseyNicole72 If you have the machine on Auto setting it may do this. Please DM us with the serial number of your machine and let us know what setting you're using the machine in. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@TerriBonner10 Oh wow, sorry about that! That is certainly not what we'd expect to hear. Please DM us with the serial number of your machine & your contact details so we can look into this. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@Missjd19 In most countries the vacuums come with a 2 year warranty. Can you let us know where you're located. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

The Dyson Institute offers a new model of Higher Education which is free, student-centric and aligned to the needs of industry. Our Undergraduates Engineers complete their degrees debt-free.  #dyson #dysoninstitute

@raulrebollo82 Hola Raul, puedes contactarnos por mensaje privado con el número de serie de la aspiradora. Estaremos encantados en ayudarte.
Un saludo
@scruff888 Can you please DM us with the serial number of your machine, also let us know what setting you have your machine in. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
Inside the Dyson V11™. Our battery technology and battery-saving trigger help to provide our longest run time by only using power when you need it. #dyson https://t.co/v1GDqsSBhm

@nino0617ars1103 Dysonデビューおめでとうございます 😀 🙌 
今後製品をご使用いただく中でご不明な点がございましたら、いつでもお気軽にご連絡ください。どうぞ末永くご愛用ください！
@behangmotief Dat is leuk om te horen. We wensen jullie er hel veel plezier mee.

@stewpeed ah ah oui effectivement, sachez qu'en mode max l'autonomie est réduite de 5-8 minutes. Sachez qu'en mode normal et avec le bon accessoire, l'aspiration est très efficace. Le mode MAX est réservé aux tâches les plus difficiles tel que l'aspiration de gros tapis. 😁

@stewpeed Bonjour, merci de votre message.
Quel appareil possédez-vous et de combien de temps est l'autonomie ?
@connollykym Try putting your machine on auto mode & it will self adjust to purify the air as quickly as possible. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@arantxasanz Hola Arantxa, gracias por compartir tu opinión con todos nosotros, nos alegra saber lo encantada que estás con el moldeador de pelo Dyson Airwrap y sobretodo saber que gracias al moldeador luces un peinado distinto cada día 😊.
¡Un saludo!

@nishantgoel2409 Hi Nishant,The price for the air purifier ranges between INR 25,900 to INR 54,900 depending upon the variant selected. If you wish to know more, DM us your contact no. and a Dyson expert would love to assist you. 😊 

Regards, 
Aastha, Dyson India 
Toll free 1800 258 6688
@czepiel_gregory Oh wow! That is just beautiful. ❤
@craigpconant Great to hear, Craig! We are happy to hear you are enjoying your new machine. If ever you have questions or concerns do not hesitate to reach out. 😀 https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@jmwb17 Send us a DM with your details. We will have a look into this for you. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@vishalcanberra Please note you can also order directly from Dyson. We offer free shipping & a 45 day money back guarantee:
https://t.co/A0MaiebEPd https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@JenaLuckman Congratulations!
@zoranworldwide That's the best idea, if at all possible. 😢 https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@Francescooo87 Ciao Francesco, abbiamo risposto a Roberto di scriverci in direct con l'ordine e i suoi dati personali, per proteggere la sua privacy, ma non abbiamo avuto riscontro ancora.
@Robs_Frau Hello Roberto, we are more than happy to check it out for you, just write us in PM so we can protect your datas and we will be at your disposal!
@yatintaneja We understand the inconvenience this may have caused you and we are doing our best to solve your case.

@jrs_817 Cleaning the shroud area is part of normal maintenance. Make sure you're not over filling the bin before emptying. If you're still having issues DM us with the serial number & your contact details. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@SoniaMarruedo point you in the right direction. Please feel free to send us a private message with your details. (2/2) https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@yatintaneja We understand your frustration, and we do the best we can.The department is aware of this case. They are processing your refund.

@yatintaneja Unfortunately it takes longer as the normal procedure, for which we apologize. We cannot communicate a specific date yet, since we are still waiting for a response of the financial department. It will be as soon as possible. Our apologies for the waiting time.

@SoniaMarruedo Hello, thanks for contacting us. Please send us a private message with the serial number about your Dyson to help you as soon as possible.
Regards.

@KateBondett Hello Kate, thank you for sharing this. Absolutely adorable. We hope you and yours have a very Happy New Year!

Best wishes.

@ronpiper5 almost instantly and the magnets bounce between the four stator positions. Like a ping-ping ball bouncing on a table, they move a smaller distance each time, creating a sound which our engineers call the "boing". (2/2)

@ronpiper5 Hi Ronald, this noise is the "boing effect". To generate the extra power of the Dyson digital motor V10, Dyson engineers doubled the number of magnets and stators.  When the trigger is released, the motor brakes the rotor to a stop (1/2)

@KatieJuanita_ We apologize for an unexpected sound.  In compliance to part 15 of FCC Rules, (1) The device may not cause harmful interference, and (2) the device must accept any interference received, including interference that may cause undesired operation.  We're always here to assist. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@AlexanderOSD Please write us in direct with your personal data and your serial number and we solve your problem. Thanks!
@OzcanMehmett Merhaba Mehmet Bey, bunu duyduğumuza üzüldük. Bizimle cihazınızın seri numarasını DM üzerinden paylaşırsanız, kontrol ederek uygun bir çözüm önerebiliriz. Teşekkürler.

@LionelMacro Hello Lionel,
Normally the amounts will no longer be visible in a short time.

@GarybateyGary We recommend contacting your local hardware professional so that you are able to receive the appropriate screw type for your home and style to support your new Dyson and ensure it and your home are protected. (2/2)
@GarybateyGary Hi Gary, screws are not included with cordless machines for liability concerns, as we do not have a one size fits all solution & every home is different. (1/2)
@LionelMacro Hello Lionel, so even if we send them an official mail about the cancellation of the order they can't remove it and have to wait for some working days ?
@mbrookeg Now that is what we love to hear! ❤
@RafStarK9 The ultimate test indeed! We're sure you'll be happy! 🐶😻
@jhaidet Congratulations on your new V11 Animal!
@amezoooo 日頃からDyson Airwrap™スタイラーをご愛顧いただきありがとうございます。今後とも、かっこいい、クールなジェルセットスタイルを作ってくださいね😎 今後とも 末永くご愛用いただければ嬉しいです ✨
@tmt9jun 日頃からDyson Supersonic Ionicヘアドライヤーをご愛顧いただきありがとうございます。これからも素敵なヘアスタイルを作ってください ✨今後とも 末永くご愛用いただければ嬉しいです 😀
@arctic_rene Oh no! Poor baby! ❤
@ShayleePhoto Be sure to use The Force!!!

@phild55815001 Hi Phil, we're very sorry to hear about this issue. Rest assured, we are keen to provide you with further assistance. Would you be happy to please confirm your country of residence?

Best wishes.
@quiethellis Hej, om man har köpt en maskin i ett EU land kan man ta med sig kvittot och få den utbytt i en Dysonbutik i USA :)

@LionelMacro Actually, most of the banks accept to erase the authorizations with the automated mail, which is totally official and explicit about the cancellation

But if your bank wants another e-mail from us, we will send it, can you give us your e-mail by dm, there should be open now https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@raulixw Puedes contactarnos también a nuestro teléfono gratuito: 900 80 36 49, o enviando un mensaje a: help@dyson.es

@raulixw Para poder ayudarte con el registro, por favor escríbenos por mensaje privado y te pediremos los datos por allí.
¡Un saludo!

@raulixw Buenos días Raul, gracias por tu contacto. Para el suelo duro recomendamos el cepillo con suave cabezal giratorio. Es el que tiene esa especie de terciopelado rojo y azul por todo alrededor. Para las alfombras se recomienda el cepillo Direct Drive que es el otro.
@RealNadiaB Please DM us with the serial number of your machine & the power setting you're using it in. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@LionelMacro Hello Lionel, the prints should have already disappeared now. If not we recommend you to show to the bank the mail about the declined orders, they will be able to erase it.
@LionelMacro We are really sorry for the inconvenience. Can you reach our helpline directly at 0 800 945 801 so that you can order directly from a Dyson agent.

@Mohamma70464832 Sir, our team is working towards getting the issue resolved as soon as possible. We are sorry about the inconvenience caused, and we will get back to you shortly with a positive resolution.

Regards,
Tanushree, Dyson India
Toll free 1800 258 6688
@Egcatalan730 Thank you for your kind comments. We always aim to provide the best service possible so it is great to receive your feedback. Merry Christmas.
@Moh_Abusamra Please ensure you are following us and you should then be able to send us a private message.
@Moh_Abusamra Thank you for your comment. Please send us a DM with your query, and we would be happy to provide the relevant steps.

@of_printer Thank you for your comments. At Dyson our business is mainly in domestic appliances for the household, and not heavy-duty machine's for business use. However, this is certainly something that may develop in the future. You never know. 😀
@Jocelyn_Marie Maybe Santa will bring you one for Christmas. 😀

@Mohamma70464832 We are extremely sorry for all the inconvenience caused. We hope our engineer visited you yesterday, and we have placed an order for the machine main body. 

Regards,
Tanushree, Dyson India
Toll Free 1800 258 6688
@dmunstar Congratulations on your new Dyson! 😊
@HerPreppiness1 Thank you for the great feedback, enjoy! 😀 https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@elizabethlynnTx Lithium ion batteries naturally degrade over time, and it's a certainty that they'll need to be replaced eventually. Feel free to DM us with the serial number & your contact details. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@lizwinks That's certainly not what we'd expect to hear! Please DM us with the country your in & the issue you need support with. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@Lottmus Oh great! Thanks for letting us know! 😊
@Cardiac_Cutie Yes, you are officially an adult! 🎄🎅

@new_orchid Hi there, I'm not seeing the serial number on this photo. Did you register your machine previously with us? We can look in our system, once we receive your contact details to provide further assistance.

Best wishes.
@winray I'm sorry to hear this. If you require any assistance, please send us a DM with your name and address details and  a description of your problem, and we would be happy to help you.

@raulrebollo82 Hola, lo sentimos profundamente. Pero necesitamos el sus datos para profundizar en el tema. Aunque le aseguramos que si usted ha llamado ya se encuentran en ello para encontrar la mejor solución.
¡Un saludo!

@raulrebollo82 Hola Raúl, sentimos profundamente la espera. Hemos tenido un fuerte retraso en los envíos. Si nos dices el número de pedido por mensaje privado podemos ubicarlo.
¡Un saludo!

@raulrebollo82 Hola Raúl, buenos días. Es que por su seguridad no aconsejamos a enviar sus datos personales en nuestro perfil público. Por favor puede llamarnos al teléfono gratuito 900 80 36 49 e inmediatamente le daremos una solución.

Gracias

@LionelMacro Good morning,

We're sincerely sorry for this awkward situation. Can you please, give us your email address in private message ? 

Thank you so much for you collaboration.

We hope you the best day possible !

@realMarcoEttel Vielen Dank für Deinen Tweet. Bitte sende uns doch eine Privatnachricht mit der Seriennummer, dem Kaufdatum, sowie Deinen Kontaktdaten und beschreibe uns das Problem möglichst genau. Wir finden bestimmt eine Lösung! Dein Dyson Social Media Team

Dein Dyson Social Media Team

Best wishes.

@turnon @JensHerforth vielen Dank für Deinen Besuch bei uns in Malmesbury. Wir hoffen Dir haben die innovativen Eindrücke auf unserem Campus gefallen 👩‍🏫 👨‍🏫 und wir werden noch weitere tolle Videos von Dir zu sehen bekommen. Liebe Grüße, Dein Dyson Team

@MaggieIsMyAgent Pretty impressive! We hope he's all healed up soon 😀

data.text:
@ReneFoobar Wir möchten selbstverständlich das Du lange Freude an unseren Geräten hast, auch über die Garantiezeit hinaus. Wir würden uns Deinen Fall gerne einmal genauer anschauen und würden Dich bitten, uns erneut in einer privaten Nachricht zu kontaktieren.

Liebe Grüsse
@cjm9891 If re-setting your password has not worked you may need to create a new account. We are unable to access customer's login details.

@leendertpuntcom Dag Leendert,

Het spijt ons te vernemen dat u dit ervaart. Onze excuses voor de vertraging.

Mvg,

Bart
@ArtemR A* for effort. I'm sure they had a lot of fun making these. 😀 👍

@leendertpuntcom Zoals zichtbaar is uw bestelling 19/06 aangeboden. Omdat er niemand aanwezig was om het aan te nemen heeft de UPS dienst besloten het naar een afhaalpunt te brengen bij u in de buurt. Ik zal u via mail meer informatie sturen. Onze excuses voor het ongemak.

Errol - Dyson Benelux
@alexbhathal Thanks for the feedback. We have started changing our packaging.

@carlosotermin Nos encanta leer tus palabras. 
El trabajo de nuestros ingenieros en esos dos dispositivos fue muy bueno y consiguieron crear algo totalmente novedoso. Que el publico también lo vea es genial. 😀 🔬

@A_Stoned_Troll Hi there, thank you for your message. I'm sorry to hear about the issue you're having with your V10. Please send us a DM with your contact details and machine's serial number. We will be more than happy to go over your machine with you and make sure it's performing as intended.
@reachvinay Thanks for your feedback, this is great to hear 🙌

@samuelgil Les haremos llegar tu comentario, no te preocupes. 😉 
¡Qué tengas un buen día!
@leatherturtle Actually, we did! https://t.co/Sawr55S7j0 Unfortunately, this was not to last long but those customers out there who still have them absolutely love the contra-rotating machines.
@iaurorastarr Don't have too much fun. Those twitch videos won't make themselves! 😉
@ST3AMCo Many thanks. Feel free to follow @JDF for up-to-date news on that front 😀
@ST3AMCo We really appreciate you reaching out. Right now, Sir James is unable to commit so we’d have to politely decline on this occasion. We wish you all the best for the event.

For Clean Air Day, Paula Radcliffe partnered with Dyson to investigate the levels of pollution she's exposed to each day. Watch her tour London with Dyson's latest technology that monitors pollution in real-time. #DysonHome #CleanAirDay https://t.co/6fIRFMXB3a

@La_Biro A te la scelta Francesca:

https://t.co/EkOtjZDrsf

@ZusterMerel @ZusterMerel Leuk om te horen dat u tevreden bent met Dyson ventilator. Onze luchtreinigende ventilatoren detecteren en verwijderen vervuilende stoffen, en verspreiden vervolgens gereinigde lucht in uw hele kamer. Heerlijk voor warme dagen!

@armycharger09 thanks for your tweet. It is understandable that you consider this unhygienic. It sounds like the hand dryer was either not installed correctly or does not fit the washbasin. Where did you see the device? Then we can contact the company and adjust everything accordingly.
KR Dyson

@Francesco_cipi sarà opportuno scegliere un modello che abbia in dotazione la spazzola a rullo morbido Fluffy
Ti invito a contattare la nostra chat sul sito https://t.co/4jHMFofJMZ per avere una consulenza personalizzata 😉
@Charwaahaa That's a very good example of why you should only ever buy genuine Dyson accessories... https://t.co/0L6uW1tHVm
@Laurie_HEEL We would like to ask you send us a DM and let us know the serial number off your machine? Please include a detailed description of the issue you are experiencing. We are keen to assist.

@macmaniacs vielen Dank für Deinen Tweet und das positive Feedback zum Dyson V11. Solltet Ihr noch Unterstützung benötigen, den passenden Dyson für die Schwiegermama zu finden, sind wir gern für Euch da.
Liebe Grüsse, Euer Dyson Social Media Team.

@gautebr Hei Gaute!
Takk for at du kontakter Dyson og beklager sent svar. 
Jeg har aldri hørt om det problemet før. Det er ikke slik våre Wash+Dry skal fungere. Luftstrømmen skal blåse ut til siden og oppover. Mulig den var montert feil. 
Mvh 
Grethe Dyson kundeservice

@ne_na_ne_ni_ta Ahora que viene el verano en Sevilla tiene que ser terrible. 🌡️ 
Desde Dyson nos encanta que compartas tu experiencia y que disfrutes de nuestro producto. 😉
@ne_na_ne_ni_ta La verdad que poder dejar tu pelo fantástico sin tener que pasar calor es una maravilla. 😍

@samboo73 Hi Sam, We are sorry to hear you are having troubles reaching the helpline. The Dyson US Helpline number is 866-693-9766 if you wanted to give us a call. Alternatively, if you'd like us to run through some checks with you in a DM we'd be keen to assist.

@AtTheHelmProd We would never expect you to receive less than great service while reaching out for support, and we would like to take a further look into your situation. To do so, please send a DM with your email and the serial number off your machine.

@kalactic H Kal, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to learn your Dyson came missing the wand. This sounds very unusual. Please consider sending us a DM with your contact details, including email and order number. We will be looking forward to your message.
Best wishes.
@diegolameiro Gracias a ti, cualquier duda que tengas ya sabes dónde encontrarnos.

@diegolameiro Piensa que funciona igual que un ventilador. Al crear una corriente de aire se genera esa sensación de refresco. De todos modos con las compras en la página web oficial, ofrecemos 30 días de prueba con devolución gratuita, por si quieres probarlo y ver si se adapta bien.

@JoshMcInerney1 It looks like there are some future Dyson engineers in your class Josh! 👩‍🔬 👨‍🔬 There are some real similarities to Sir James' own! If they've got time, you never know, after 5,127 prototypes they too might be creating revolutionary products too! https://t.co/tWa5sY1mNT

Outside interference can make you lose your cool. That’s why we created our solid steel electromagnetic testing chamber when developing the Dyson Pure Cool Me™. It’s how we make sure our machines won’t affect any of the other devices in your home. #Dyson #DysonHome #InsideDyson https://t.co/p36FsWlAAh

@diegolameiro Hola Diego, tienes que tener en cuenta que refresca en verano y en invierno calienta, pero no enfría como un aire acondicionado.
¡Un saludo!
@DeborrahS We are sorry to see you are having troubles with your machine and would like to ask you send us a DM and let us know the serial number off your machine? We are keen to assist.
@TaiylorMorgan Thank you for reaching out. Please visit the following website to submit your donation request: https://t.co/7TI7zJElmn

@AJHufflepuff As far as we know, nothing! But we'd be keen to help you. Can you send us a private message with your full name, address including postcode and the serial number? If you have any screenshots of the error you're getting, these would be helpful too. We can then look into this. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW
@anoyes There's no shame in *accidentally* dropping those crumbs or inviting a certain dachshund onto the furniture and exclaiming "Oh no! Hairs!" 😱 Your favourite cleaning companion is waiting 👍

@KLee54622504 They're surprisingly well-balanced when you use them. The weight is above and below the hand which gives a comfortable position for vacuuming. We'd recommend finding one in a store and trying it out 😀

We put all our machines through their paces. We design tests that make sure all our products are ready to solve real world problems. Like checking the High Torque cleaner head removes ground-in dirt and dust properly. No red carpet treatment here. #Dyson #DysonHome https://t.co/uTxxhZ1o84
@ditsy_woman You're most welcome. Has it resolved the issue you were experiencing with the machine? Most recycling centres should take Lithium-Ion/battery products, so we recommend checking locally.

@ChristineBravo7 Nous essayons de vous aider, mais nous n'avons toujours pas reçu votre numéro de série. 

Cela serait dommage de ne pas trouver une solution pour voter appareil. 

Nous attendons donc votre message. 

Bell soirée Christine.

@ChristineBravo7 Savez-vous que la pièce facturée est garantie un an ? 

Donnez-nous votre numéro de série et nous vous renverrons la pièce gratuitement. 

Nous ne souhaitons pas que vous restiez sur une mauvaise expérience.

Belle fin de journée.

@Toulousenord Bonjour, 

Nos appareils sont garantis 2 ans pour les sans fils et 5 ans pour les traineaux. 

Nous allons donc pouvoir l'aider, ne vous inquiétez pas. 😀 

Passez une belle fin de journée.

@EmmanuelleLac Bonjour Emmanuelle, 

Avez-vous un problème avec votre appareil ?

Nous sommes là, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter en DM et nous vous aiderons !

Passez une belle fin de journée.

@ChristineBravo7 Bonjour Christine, 

Pas de panique, nous sommes là pour vous aider ! 

Pouvez-vous nous envoyer en DM votre adresse mail, numéro de série de l'appareil et votre facture d'achat ? 

À très vite !

@BMillerPKC It's amazing to think how far we've come! We're constantly making prototypes and testing new products to ensure they're up to the task. We'll continue to solve those problems others choose to ignore for the foreseeable future. 👩‍🔬 👨‍🔬

The Dyson Village provides accommodation for Undergraduate Engineers at our Malmesbury Technology Campus. See how Dyson and @WilkinsonEyre have delivered fresh new thinking to inspire the next generation of engineers. Find out more at https://t.co/frFPQXp6wu #Dyson #InsideDyson https://t.co/YIM9uj6us3
@Aqcareius Asking the big questions! If you have a Dyson Animal model, it would likely go purrrr 🐱 or woof 🐶
@AJS71 Woops! 🙈  Let's hope they enjoy vacuuming as much as they do emptying the contents everywhere 😀
@kaileybreeann_ Let's hope he continues this useful cleaning streak 🤞
@britttanyzimm We're very pleased you're enjoying the Dyson Supersonic™ dryer 😀
@Ynotna1978 C'est fait 🙂
@Ynotna1978 Ce n'est pas nécessaire, il vous suffit de cliquer sur la petite enveloppe en bas à droite de l'application, ou si vous préférez vous pouvez aussi nous écrire à l'adresse help@dyson.fr
@anthopute We received your private message and replied 🙂
@anthopute Sure, you can dm us by clicking on private message on the left of the page, here's a screen : https://t.co/cKeJtYTogD

@HopemanHB Schaue bitte auf unsere Webseite unter Service, dann
unter Online Service. 
Du kannst Du es über unsere Facebook Seite probieren,
mit einem Private Message, das kommt dann auch bei
uns im Social Media Kundendienst an.
Das kriegen wir hin.
Elke

@HopemanHB Vielleicht ist da ein Tippfehler, hier eine Kopie von der Webseite. Whatsapp ist auf jeden Fall online:
Kontakt
WhatsApp
Privatkunden: 
08003131318
Probiere es bitte noch einmal, danke
Elke
Dyson Team

@anthopute Hello Antho,

Yes, we will find a solution 🙂 

Can you check under the brush if something is stuck inside ?

If there is nothing, please send us your contact information by dm,

Thank you

@HopemanHB Guten Tag,
wir machen das so, wie es für Dich am besten ist. 
Am einfachsten geht das über Whatsapp: 08003131318.
Dann klären wir das zusammen zu Deiner 
Zufriedenheit. Was hältst Du davon? Wir sind bis 20 Uhr da. 
Vielen Dank für Deine Rückmeldung.
Dyson Kundendienst
Elke
@DeblaaDeeZa If the filter tapping doesn't work let us know. We have other suggestions.
@DeblaaDeeZa How is your machine now? Has tapping the filter out solved the pulsating?
@HopemanHB Mit der Rückerstattung wurde auf Deine Forderung in Deiner Mail reagiert. So dass Dir der Betrag noch in der 30-tägigen Rückgabegarantie zurückerstattet werden kann.

@HopemanHB Die Kollegen sind gerade dabei Deinen Fall abzuschließen. Die Rückerstattung wird bearbeitet. Nach den Feiertagen sollten wir Neuigkeiten haben. Vielen Dank für Deine bisherige Geduld. Dyson Social Media Team

@DeblaaDeeZa Your machine's pulsating. Take the filter out and run it again. It will run smoothly.  It's a safety feature to stop the machine from overheating. It happens because there is not enough air flowing over the motor. We can sort this. PM us.
@Lee1188UK Oh no, it certainly shouldn't be doing that! Please pop us a DM with some further details and we'll help to get this sorted out for you.
@PilzigTV Vielen Dank für Deine Frage. Bei dem Gerät handelt es sich um den Dyson Pure Cool Me. Solltest weitere Fragen haben, kannst Du uns diese gerne stellen. Dyson Social Media Team.
This week we officially opened our student village for the Dyson Institute of Engineering and Technology in Malmesbury. Read all about it in today’s @TheSTMagazine #Dyson #InsideDyson

@MelissaakaMom Hi,

If you're having frequent clogs in the brush you may wish to clean that after each vacuuming session, depending upon how often you vacuum.  The pulsing will alert you to a blockage, so the motor does not overheat. Feel free to DM us your information & we'll be happy to help.
@deeedobbs Hi Danielle, would you be happy to confirm your country of residence?

@MelissaakaMom Hi there, I'm sorry to hear you're unhappy with your Dyson cordless. I can confirm that intermittent running may be due to a blockage. We'd value the opportunity to go over your machine with you, and provide you with support. Please DM us with your contact details and serial #.
@songking We make a mess in the office intentionally for just this reason if we're honest 😂 🙌

@olivermaizie1 Can you send us a private message with your full name, address and postcode? We'll be able to comply with account security and access your account then. Let us know if the machine is still cutting out with the filter and bin removed as well.
@olivermaizie1 If you remove the bin and the filter, does the V6 still cut out? We would be happy to have a look at your account Claire. Feel free to send us your details.

@olivermaizie1 Oh dear, We can understand why you are not happy. Let's see how we can get you vacuuming again. Please send us a private message with your full name, address, postcode and the serial number of the DC40. That's on the main body behind the bin.

@crtrtn As a manufacturer we appreciate the importance limiting effects on the environment, you can learn more on the below link :

https://t.co/tMQDoKnCJM

@lukeaikman Oh dear. The dock is complete apart from the perspex piece? Can you send us a DM with your full name, address, postcode and the serial number of your machine? We'll help you to get this sorted.
@richellefreyes Well, you're not wrong! 🙌 👌
We’re obsessed with the science of hair. See inside our latest #DysonHair event in Australia, where we revealed how to keep your hair healthy and the impact of extreme heat. https://t.co/ZdIAZOK3hm

@deeedobbs Hi Danielle, I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your Dyson Supersonic™ hair dryer. We'd be keen to help. Please send us a DM with your contact details, including the serial number from your dryer. We'll be looking forward to your reply.
Best wishes.

@alicesp18 Hi Alice, oh I understand! I've got a cordless with pets too, so I totally get it. If she doesn't have any luck at Costco, have her reach out to us. We're always happy to help! Have a great weekend.

@alicesp18 Hi Alice, I'm sorry to hear your Dyson isn't working properly. Please consider sending us a DM with your contact details, including your machine's serial number and we will be happy to assist you with this further.
Best wishes.

@MelTheDJ Research shows that many people like to vacuum in short bursts, which is why the cord-free machines are popular. We still have corded machines for customers who like to do their cleaning in one go. Our newest cordless does work for 1 hour though.

@Billa1995 In that case, if we see the boss we'll certainly ask 😉 Of course, he's probably busy working on the Dyson electric vehicle in our top-secret R&D facility 🤔 so we may not see him for some time.  Best of luck getting there and enjoy the tour!
@Billa1995 That might depend... Are you a Bristol fan or a Bath fan?

@Ayver Beste Ayver, 

Hartelijk dank voor uw bericht, wij begrijpen dat het een vervelende kwestie is. 
Wij hebben net nieuws gekregen dat de omwisseling begin volgende week gaat plaatsvinden. 

Een tracking nummer zal nog per mail toegestuurd worden. 
Met vriendelijke groet, 
Arjen

@AllCharisma This isn't how we thought our day would go 😱 In honesty, we've not tested our machines on storage bags. Do they fit? Depending on the machine, you should get anywhere from 20 to 60 minutes of high performance cleaning. Maybe you left it in max mode? 🤔 That would limit runtime.

@Ayver Beste Ayver, 
Bedankt. We constateren dat we de juiste profile hebben. We zijn bezig om te kijken wat er gebeurd. Vandaag laten we u weten wat er gebeurt is.
Met vriendelijk groet
Concha
Dyson BNL Team

@Ayver Beste Ayver, we hebben uw profile in ons systeem gevonden. Zou u aub een email naar os kunnen sturen dat we kunnen constateren dat dit profile van u is? We proberen u te helpen en het probleem met uw V11 op te lossen. 
Alvast bedankt
Mvg, Concha
Dyson BNL Team

@Ayver @Ayver  Helaas kunnen we geen prive berichten sturen via de Twitter. U kunt onze klante dienst berieken via gratis nummer: 0800-0206203 of mail: help@dyson.nl.
We horen het graag van u.

@Ayver Beste Ayver,
Om zeker te weten dat wij u profile in onze systeem hebben, willen we graag aan u vragen in een privé bericht uw gegevens toesturen. U kunt ook uw gegevens via help@dyson.nl toesturen. 
Alvast bedankt
Mvg, Concha
Dyson BNL Team

@Ayver Beste Ayver, 

Bedankt voor uw bericht, kunt u ons uw gegevens en bestelnummer in een privé bericht toesturen?
Wij gaan graag voor u na wat er gaande is. 

Met vriendelijke groet, 
Arjen https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

data.text: @BRITVIC1981 I am sorry to see you have had a wait to connect to one of our advisors, if you still need assistance we would like to help. Just send us a PM with your details including address and serial number. We look forward to hearing from you. All the best. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@HelenGr17369929 If you have recently washed the filter and there is still no power after 24hrs, this would indicate the filter is not quite dry, please allow up to 48 hours drying time. Please let us know how you get on. Many thanks.
@Alice_OLeary That's great to hear Alice, I am pleased to hear you have received your battery and the machine is now back up and running. We aim to provide a quick and efficient service.
@deletethewife Oh no! What a cheeky pup! 🐶 Please send us a DM with some more details and we'll see what we can do for you. https://t.co/RHgPAHm6XW

@RosemaryCattlif We are unable to advise of a precise date for new stock to arrive, as it has been some weeks since our last stock we should be expecting this soon. You can select 'Keep me updated' on the following web page for the UK, we'll email you when you can order. https://t.co/g6EHRnCroi

@oddlaritza Lower price will not be honored if the result of a violation of a Dyson unilateral advertising or pricing policy or if doing so would result in a violation of a Dyson policy. You can view this online at: https://t.co/KeonF7o1JA (2/2)

@VoteAlexFox Bigger isn't necessarily better. Dyson motors are lightweight, fast and as efficient as possible. The motor in our latest cord free vacuum the Dyson Cyclone V10 ™ is able to reach speeds of up to 125,000 RPM.
@MegsBennettFit That's curious. Send us a DM with the details, the machine's Serial number, Link App version, and your customer account contact details, and we'll get this looked into.
@Ade_Hicks That is definitely unusual. Please DM us with the item you were trying to buy and your contact details including your address.

@Wreckedteenss We don't recommend it, especially if the voltage power are different. You can try the adapter but there is no guarantee it will work. Please DM us if you have any further questions. 

All the best.
@carlahostie Hi there! Feel free to contact @JDF You can find out more about them here: https://t.co/EKXGoGjCyL

@JesusAvina3 We'll need more information before we can even begin to make a comment about what you've mentioned here. Please can you send us a direct message with the details, serial number and contact information?
@50shadesofok We're not sure what machine you have, however we're here to help. Please DM us the machine's serial number and your contact details.
@IanEfrat There's been a few issues with Facebook in general. That said, we're here to help. DM us with your contact details and the machine's serial number.

@daymanahhaaa We can help! Maybe a setting or two needs to be changed to suit your hair type best. Send us a DM with the details, and we'll work this out together. In the mean time, check out our styling guides here to see if there's anything you've missed: https://t.co/uIdcOOem1g
@sunflowerzsarah We're working on getting Dyson Airwrap™ back again so you can get yours as soon as possible. Register here if you'd like to receive emailed stock updates: https://t.co/ynUYeohsy5

@maccollalex Hi, sorry to hear about your experience. This does sound rather unusual, however to allow us to review this, email askdyson@dyson.co.uk with the machine's serial number, your contact details with an explanation of the issue.

@otisamantha Hi there, 

Thank you very much for your kind feedback and we hope you get well soon!
@RERblog Hi there, it is absolutely fine to swoon 😉.

@carryoncake Hi there,
Thank you for your mention.
I am sorry to see that the wand on your new machine is dented.  This is not something that we would expect at all.
Please may you confirm if you managed to get through to us and arrange a replacement wand to be sent?
Best wishes.

@ChristopherNF37 Hi there,
Thank you for your comment and for your kind words.
I am glad to hear that you are happy with your cordless machine.
If you have any issues in the future please do get in touch with us and we would be happy to assist you.
Best wishes.

@SudburyKevin Hi there,
Thank you for your comment.
I am sorry to hear of the issue that you are having with your machine.
Please could you kindly send us a DM confirming your name, full address and the serial number and perhaps a video of this as well?
Many thanks.

@MartyMtweets Hi Marty, 

Whilst we wouldn't be able to confirm specifically if our machines have been tested with glitter, they have undergone extensive testing in domestic environments.  Take a look!  👉 https://t.co/UlvzZA0nsa

@MrsM381 Hi, we are based in Australia with limited information about Airwrap availability in other regions unfortunately. However, if you register your interest on our site in your country of residence you'll be notified when stock if available.
@deborahreynold3 Hi, it sounds like you're having an issue with a Dyson cord-free machine? DM us the machine's serial number with a detailed explanation of the issue, so we can assist you further.

@Kezza_802 Hi, we appreciate your patience, unfortunately we haven't received an ETA from our UK team. However, if you register your interest on our UK site you'll be notified when we get more stock. 
- Dyson AU
@MiaSun87147741 Hi there, thank you for your interest.  Please feel free to direct your question through by email to china.service@dyson.com and we'll pass it along for you.

@MissDevonScott Hi Devon, Thanks for your Tweet. Please can you send us a direct message letting us know the colour you were expecting to receive, the Dyson order number, and contact details used on the order including full name, billing address & postcode to help us look into this for you?
@ma_dash_n Definitely check https://t.co/Jf3kStD5fk when you can. If you challenge convention and are obsessed with improvement, you're looking in the right place. All the best with your masters!
@ma_dash_n As far as we're concerned, cord-free technology is perfect for dancing as you clean. No need for a club...
@Roboldie Hi Roboldie, we need more details relatively to your order. Please contact our chat team through https://t.co/5S3q3o0xA5 to get immediate assistance. Dyson Social Team

“If we miss out on having females in engineering, you have just wasted 50% of the ideas that could revolutionise the world”. Hear Dyson engineers discuss the misconceptions of women in the industry and their advice for aspiring engineers. #IWD2019 #BalanceforBetter #InsideDyson https://t.co/OT17XVKd4e

@oklandon Hello there, thanks for your question. We'd suggest contacting our business department for Dyson Airblade Hand Dryers directly via our website in your country. We're not sure where you are based so feel free to use this Dyson international country locator: https://t.co/RZYVGqzmca

@jembarnesy Hi there, we're sorry to hear you feel this way. The clear bin doesn't appear to be attached correctly, please try removing and reattaching it with the bin base open as shown here: https://t.co/o3pw5nLBjC - if that doesn't correct it please send us a Direct Message.

@jembarnesy Hi there, we're sorry to hear you feel this way. The clear bin doesn't appear to be attached correctly, please try removing and reattaching it with the bin base open as shown here: https://t.co/o3pw5nLBjC - if that doesn't correct the issues please send us a Direct Message.

@Paige2psu Hello there, thank you for your message. So that we can best assist with your machine, please can you send us a direct message including your full name, the machine's serial number and your billing address details? What happens exactly when vacuuming the rug in question?

@werecat_13 Hello there, thanks for your feedback. There is a quick release adaptor for the non-motorised tools of earlier machines available direct from Dyson in most territories, we haven't designed a motorized adaptor at this stage, apologies for any disappointment. Best wishes, Mira

@panton_chris Hello Chris, Personally, needle nosed tweezers are helpful in keeping the mini roller axles clear, as is checking the machine often to ensure hair doesn't get built up in the first place. Feel free to send us a DM with your serial number & your details if it keeps happening.

@wake_up_maggie_ Hello and thanks for asking about the Dyson Airwrap hair styler. While we can't confirm exactly when the stock will arrive at this point, please feel free to register to receive Airwrap stock updates and notifications via https://t.co/ynUYeohsy5

@moremojo Hi MJ, Sorry to hear you were unhappy with what's occurred, we'll be more than happy to look into it for you, could you send us a direct message with the machine's serial number, details of the part you need and your contact information - billing address, zip, & email?

@PDXJenni Hi Jennifer, Thanks for your tweets. Well, the recently replaced Dyson Cyclone V10 cordless vacuums are the first cord free machines designed to replace a corded vacuum so they are well worth a look at: https://t.co/gGoZYkIJFx

@jimmrt Hi Jim, 

Thanks you for your tweet. I can also see that you've sent us a private message which I will respond to now. Hopefully we can get this issue resolved quickly.

Many thanks,

Jack
Dyson UK

@MarybiCortes Hi Marybri, we'll be more than happy to help you with your Dyson machine. Please feel free to send us a direct message with the serial number and your details and we'll go over it with you and get the suction working correctly again. Many thanks, Mira

@jacobschulman This could also revolutionise the barbering industry 🤔 Not many people know what our R&D teams are working on, so you never know what might already be in the pipeline. In the meantime, beards are still a strong look!

@MRuzow Hi Meris, Thanks for your kind words, and we're glad that we could help! To help us link your experience to the Dyson expert that helped you, you may send us a direct message including the machine's serial number and the contact details it's registered under. Best wishes, Mira

@aktelmiele Hi Greg, thank you for the Tweet. The web error message came across a little small to be able to read easily, it does look like you may need to order this part from our helpline in the interim, please call 01-475-7109, we are open 8am-8pm weekdays and to 6pm weekends. -Mira
@suegeboers Hi Susan, great question! So that we can provide you with accurate information, would you be happy to confirm your country of residence? Best wishes, Kelly
@JoyB40 Hi Sonia, yes you sure can! We'll reply as soon as that comes through. Best wishes, Kelly
@JoyB40 Hi Sonia, no worries. If you can confirm your country of residence, we can direct you the proper team. Best wishes, Kelly

@JoyB40 Hi Sonia, I'm sorry to hear you've had this issue. We're keen to help. Please DM us with your email address, complete home address, phone # and machine's serial number along with the date/location where purchased and we'll be happy to get this registered for you. ~Kelly

@robina87 Hi Ruby, thank you for your tweet. Please note that there is heavy snow in the South West of England which is affecting the number of people that can physically get into work on the Helpline today. There is a delay as a direct result. 1/2
@hjarta5 Wow! Thinking outside the box with some creative use of Dyson technology. Keep warm and stay safe.

@JulieColbear Hi Julie,

Thanks for your kind words.
